message:
Cotton/Rajesh
Thanks.
Your blog is so helpful  for using HTTPS client.
I installed certificates in PSkeystore.
uncommented integrationgateway.properties file
Encrypted password.
Firewall changes also done.
After this able to communicate with nexmo
Creted an external node an dgave nexmo URL created in our dash board in primary column
Please contact nexmo support fo r IP address an dcertificates and all.
They will provide the details.
Rajesh,
Please share me about pricing they provided.

Thanks
Sree
